statements: UPDATE user_activity SET engagement_score = 8.5, interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 123 AND content_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity SET interaction_type = 'comment', activity_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE content_id = 789 AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity SET engagement_score = 8.5, interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 101 AND content_id = 202 AND activity_date = '2022-07-15';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_date = '2022-07-20', engagement_score = 9.0 WHERE user_id = 201 AND interaction_type = 'comment';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activity SET duration_minutes = 30, activity_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET username='JohnDoe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type='Login', duration_minutes=30, activity_date='2022-03-15 08:00:00' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE UserActivity SET activity_type='login', timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE CourseEngagement SET average_rating=4.5, total_views=500, most_viewed_lesson='Introduction to Programming' WHERE course_id=101;
UPDATE UserActivity SET activity_type = 'login', timestamp = '2022-10-05 09:00:00' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE CourseEngagement SET most_viewed_lesson = 'Lesson 5: Advanced Techniques', total_views = total_views + 10 WHERE course_id = 456;
